properties.name: canDecoupleGlobalTimeContext
properties.description: Indicates if widget that is bound to global date context can decouple from it. If that widget is decoupled, it is unsubscribed from global date context updates and date context related controls are displayed on widget view.
properties.rawdescription:
Indicates if widget that is bound to global date context can decouple from it. If that widget is decoupled, it is
unsubscribed from global date context updates and date context related controls are displayed on widget view.

properties.name: widgetInstanceGlobalTimeContext
properties.description: Indicates if instance of widget is bound to global date context. It can be only used with widgets which dynamic component definition contains displaySettings allowing to use it with global date context.
properties.rawdescription:
Indicates if instance of widget is bound to global date context. It can be only used with widgets which
dynamic component definition contains displaySettings allowing to use it with global date context.
